description: From Middle English forgan, from Old English foregān, equivalent to fore- +‎ go.

verbs.description: forego (third-person singular simple present foregoes, present participle foregoing, simple past forewent, past participle foregone)

examples: pleasing remembrance of a thought foregone

verbs.description: forego (third-person singular simple present foregoes, present participle foregoing, simple past forewent, past participle foregone)

entries.meaning: Alternative spelling of forgo; to abandon, to relinquish
